language.manialib_helps_php_programmers: ManiaLib helps PHP programmers create dynamic Manialinks faster
language.manialib_explanation: In more technical terms, ManiaLib is a $olightweight PHP framework$o for the development of Manialinks. It provides a set of object-oriented libraries to help you save time on classic ManiaLink tasks.
language.goto_project_website_explanation: Visit the project's page on Google Code to download the latest version of ManiaLib. You will also find examples and documentation.
